Class Arduino

java.lang.Object
  Arduino
All Implemented Interfaces:
gnu.io.SerialPortEventListener, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.EventListener
public class Arduino
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, gnu.io.SerialPortEventListener

IRarduino.java This code manages the connection to the IR sensor connected to an arduino board. Additionally, said board will be connected at some point to Push-button sensors, and said information will need to be collected from it.

Revision History:

  • March 28, 2008, Benjamin Gauronskas
    • Rewrote the code so that it would work with the robot.
    • Fixed bugs in output.
    • Added comments.
  • March ??, 2008, Joyce Tang
    • Initial version.
